info.sql:
CREATE TABLE block (
id TEXT NOT NULL,
space_id TEXT NOT NULL,
version REAL NOT NULL,
last_version REAL,
type TEXT NOT NULL,
properties TEXT,
content TEXT,
discussions TEXT,
view_ids TEXT,
collection_id TEXT,
permissions TEXT,
created_time REAL,
last_edited_time REAL,
copied_from TEXT,
file_ids TEXT,
ignore_block_count INTEGER,
is_template INTEGER,
parent_id TEXT,
parent_table TEXT,
alive INTEGER NOT NULL,
moved TEXT,
format TEXT,
created_by TEXT,
last_edited_by TEXT,
created_by_table TEXT,
created_by_id TEXT,
last_edited_by_table TEXT,
last_edited_by_id TEXT,
content_classification TEXT,
meta_user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
meta_last_access_timestamp REAL NOT NULL,
meta_role TEXT,
CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (id, meta_user_id)
)

statements.sql: create table if not exists notion (id integer primary key, key unique, value)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS key_value_store (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, key TEXT UNIQUE, value TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transactions (
	id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
	value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS records (
	record_table TEXT,
	record_id TEXT,
	record_value TEXT,
	timestamp NUMERIC,
	parent_table TEXT,
	parent_id TEXT,
	CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (record_table, record_id)
)
CREATE INDEX record_lru_timestamp ON records (timestamp)
CREATE INDEX record_parent ON records (record_table, parent_table, parent_id)

INSERT INTO transactions (id, value)
SELECT substr(key, 24), json_extract(value, '$.value') FROM notion
WHERE key LIKE 'LocalTransactionStore3:%'
ALTER TABLE records ADD COLUMN importance NUMERIC
DROP INDEX record_lru_timestamp
CREATE INDEX record_lru_important_timestamp ON records (importance, timestamp)
DROP INDEX record_parent
DROP INDEX record_lru_important_timestamp
ALTER TABLE records RENAME TO previous_records

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS records (
	record_table TEXT,
	record_id TEXT,
	record_value TEXT,
	timestamp NUMERIC,
	parent_table TEXT,
	parent_id TEXT,
	importance NUMERIC,
	user_id TEXT,
	CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (record_table, record_id, user_id)
)

INSERT INTO records (record_table, record_id, record_value, timestamp, parent_table, parent_id, importance)
SELECT record_table, record_id, record_value, timestamp, parent_table, parent_id, importance FROM previous_records
DROP TABLE previous_records
CREATE INDEX record_parent ON records (record_table, parent_table, parent_id, user_id)
CREATE INDEX record_lru_important_timestamp ON records (importance, timestamp)
CREATE INDEX record_user_id ON records (user_id)
ALTER TABLE transactions ADD COLUMN user_id TEXT
CREATE INDEX transactions_user_id ON transactions (user_id)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS offline_root (
    user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    record_table TEXT NOT NULL,
    record_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (record_table, record_id, user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS offline_sync_parent (
    user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    root_table TEXT NOT NULL,
    root_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_parent_table TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_parent_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    state TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_updated_local_timestamp INTEGER NOT NULL,
    last_synced_global_cursor TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (sync_parent_table, sync_parent_id, user_id)
)
CREATE INDEX offline_sync_parent_root ON offline_sync_parent (user_id, root_table, root_id)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS offline_record_pointer (
    user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    root_table TEXT NOT NULL,
    root_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_parent_table TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_parent_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    record_table TEXT NOT NULL,
    record_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    is_full_sync_in_progress NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (user_id, root_id, sync_parent_id, record_id)
)
CREATE INDEX record_id_idx ON offline_record_pointer (record_id)
CREATE INDEX root_id_idx ON offline_record_pointer (root_id)
CREATE INDEX sync_parent_id_idx ON offline_record_pointer (sync_parent_id, is_full_sync_in_progress)
ALTER TABLE records ADD COLUMN is_offline
DROP INDEX record_lru_important_timestamp
CREATE INDEX record_lru_deletion_order ON records (is_offline, importance, timestamp)
ALTER TABLE records ADD COLUMN space_id TEXT
DROP INDEX IF EXISTS record_parent
DROP INDEX IF EXISTS record_user_id
CREATE INDEX record_user_parent_id ON records (user_id, parent_id, parent_table, record_table)
DROP INDEX IF EXISTS record_user_parent_id
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS record_parent ON records (parent_id, user_id)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS offline_record_pointer
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS offline_sync_parent

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS block (
	id TEXT NOT NULL,
	space_id TEXT NOT NULL,
	version REAL NOT NULL,
	last_version REAL,
	type TEXT NOT NULL,
	properties TEXT,
	content TEXT,
	discussions TEXT,
	view_ids TEXT,
	collection_id TEXT,
	permissions TEXT,
	created_time REAL,
	last_edited_time REAL,
	copied_from TEXT,
	file_ids TEXT,
	ignore_block_count INTEGER,
	is_template INTEGER,
	parent_id TEXT,
	parent_table TEXT,
	alive INTEGER NOT NULL,
	moved TEXT,
	format TEXT,
	created_by TEXT,
	last_edited_by TEXT,
	created_by_table TEXT,
	created_by_id TEXT,
	last_edited_by_table TEXT,
	last_edited_by_id TEXT,
	content_classification TEXT,
	meta_user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
	meta_last_access_timestamp REAL NOT NULL,
	meta_role TEXT,
	CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (id, meta_user_id)
)
CREATE INDEX block_parent_id ON block (parent_id, meta_user_id)
CREATE INDEX lru_deletion_order ON block (meta_last_access_timestamp)
CREATE TABLE notion (id integer primary key, key unique, value)
CREATE TABLE key_value_store (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, key TEXT UNIQUE, value TEXT)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
value TEXT
, user_id TEXT)

CREATE TABLE records (
record_table TEXT,
record_id TEXT,
record_value TEXT,
timestamp NUMERIC,
parent_table TEXT,
parent_id TEXT,
importance NUMERIC,
user_id TEXT, is_offline, space_id TEXT,
CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (record_table, record_id, user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE offline_root (
user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
record_table TEXT NOT NULL,
record_id TEXT NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (record_table, record_id, user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE block (
id TEXT NOT NULL,
space_id TEXT NOT NULL,
version REAL NOT NULL,
last_version REAL,
type TEXT NOT NULL,
properties TEXT,
content TEXT,
discussions TEXT,
view_ids TEXT,
collection_id TEXT,
permissions TEXT,
created_time REAL,
last_edited_time REAL,
copied_from TEXT,
file_ids TEXT,
ignore_block_count INTEGER,
is_template INTEGER,
parent_id TEXT,
parent_table TEXT,
alive INTEGER NOT NULL,
moved TEXT,
format TEXT,
created_by TEXT,
last_edited_by TEXT,
created_by_table TEXT,
created_by_id TEXT,
last_edited_by_table TEXT,
last_edited_by_id TEXT,
content_classification TEXT,
meta_user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
meta_last_access_timestamp REAL NOT NULL,
meta_role TEXT,
CONSTRAINT primary_key PRIMARY KEY (id, meta_user_id)
)
CREATE INDEX transactions_user_id ON transactions (user_id)
CREATE INDEX record_lru_deletion_order ON records (is_offline, importance, timestamp)
CREATE INDEX record_parent ON records (parent_id, user_id)
CREATE INDEX block_parent_id ON block (parent_id, meta_user_id)
CREATE INDEX lru_deletion_order ON block (meta_last_access_timestamp)
